meanings.sent1: The climbers experienced hypobaric conditions at high altitudes.
meanings.sent2: Pilots are trained to handle hypobaric environments in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animals felt light as a feather in the hypobaric room.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt hypobaric, as if floating in a sea of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The hypobaric chamber simulated the thin air of a mountain peak.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a condition of reduced pressure.
meanings.sent1: The hypobaric chamber helped divers adjust to lower pressure underwater.
meanings.sent2: The hypobaric suit protected astronauts in the vacuum of space.
meanings.sent3: The deflating balloon made a hypobaric sound as it lost air.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded hypobaric over the crackling radio transmission.
meanings.sent5: The hypobaric conditions in the submarine made it feel like a different world.
